…healthcare. We have other alternatives to ObamaCare that are 50 percent  less expensive, and they are actually better.'' Nothing. It never  happened.

September 10, 2024, ABC News Presidential debate, he says: ``I have  concepts of a plan. . . . You will be hearing about it in the not-too- distant future.'' Nothing happened.

December 8, 2024, he said:…

…Adams, Jacob: THE DAILY       SIGNAL; Adams, Jonas: NATIONAL PUBLIC RADIO (NPR); Adams,       Kimberly: MARKETPLACE RADIO; Adams, Lori: FOX NEWS; Adkinson,       Nicholas: ABC NEWS; ADLERBLUM, ROBIN: ABC NEWS; Adly, Jill:       NEXSTAR MEDIA GROUP; Advani, Reena: NATIONAL PUBLIC RADIO       (NPR); Aebli, Roger: SWISS BROADCASTING; Aghguiguian, Avedis:…
